title: MAKE KAYN AVAILABLE
body:
How much longer do we have to wait?
Just make him available in shop.

replies.body:
Lord, people are already making these threads? They NEVER instantly release a champion with a patch. EVER. They ALWAYS roll out skins/champs/events etc. THROUGHOUT the patch to give people something to look towards. Kayn will most likely be out later today unless something comes up in which case he'll probably be delayed a day or two. 

Be. Fucking. Patient. 

You weebs will get your edgy ass champion soon
Whats the point of that tho lel I just wanna play the dude
LOL,I am not a weeb I am just hyped to play him he seems so cool and fun to play.
You fucking realize the game has to patch in order for Kayn to be available?

You fucking realize the patch has been rolled out for most of us and we're playing on 7.14 with Kayn not in the shop, right? 

Nothing wrong with him expecting a champion to be released along with everything else in the patch.
New champions are rarely released with the patch. Generally they are help back a bit so that Riot can make sure the rest of the patch isn't causing any issues.
Wait it patched? but isn't it on maintenance?
I guess they ended it early and are gonna take a few hours to work Kayn into the live servers? I don't know, but it updated for me.
well my bad I had no idea it patched i left my computer on a few hours back and came back to maintenance

I wish people would understand that whenever they patch the game they hold back on certain assets in order to make sure that the rest of the patch doesn't cause any issues. There is tons of code involved with theses patches and if they just dumped it all in it would be harder to trace the source if an issue came up. New characters are a huge change so it is always best to make sure the rest of the patch goes through before introducing a new element.
They never turn the new champion on until a ways into the patch.
